title: Minimap Scaling Inconsistencies
body:
Riot -
I have to run LOL at 1920x1080 (or lower) on my 27" 2560x1440 screen because of this weird minimap element scaling. 

Champion icons on the minimap at 2560x1440 are the size of a dull pencil tip. 

Is it possible we can fix this for higher resolution monitors?

(See attachment: Minimap 100% scale)

In the middle of a battle glancing at the minimap across 27" to look for player specks is a headache and hurts my map awareness.

replies.body: I logged in to upvote this as well. This is a problem for me since I switch between a 1080p external monitor and playing on a Retina Macbook Pro screen. I have to stay in 1080p at all times to avoid this problem, and - as someone who also uses the minimap regularly to enhance gameplay - it's a simple problem that's an easy fix. Thanks for posting!!
That's just silly, hope they can fix that for you. If you would like to help my cause and buy me a monitor like that I would really put up a stink because I would then be affected as well.
Does anyone know how to get Riots attention?

Getting upvotes and a legitimate discussion, I guess.
You've got my upvote.

btw, I wouldn't be too worried if no Rioter responds - they sometimes read feedback without responding.

Thanks!

I think this would be an easy fix too. Just scale the icons with the minimap.

What resolution do you run at?

I've run several different resolutions due to switching monitors (or TV's :3 ) 

This is an issue I have noticed also, but didn't think much of it considering most people don't look at the mini-map anyways :D

I sincerely hope they do look into it, and given Riot Games is built by  the player foundation I'm sure we'll find a fix soon.

Best Regards, 
Josh AKA Floozy
Proud Riot Games Contributor
{{champion:42}}
Bump! Unfortunately no minimap update with the new map.  Anyone else having trouble with this?

I agree.  Its really annoying to have to play at 1440x900 or something like that because I actually use my minimap to play the game and support my team.  The landscape and everything about the game looks great at the highest resolution on my retina display but the cursor also shrinks with the icons.  Losing your cursor in a team fight=instant death.  So please Riot fix this issue for the mac client.  I know a few other players with pc's and they seem to be unaffected, which makes this problem more frustrating, as do all the fixes out there that used to work before being disabled by a patch.

I think its great that Riot does all this in depth and cool stuff to increase strategic diversity, but a little attention to the game client is also important.  Hopefully the SR update will come with a fix for this as well.

You would think after 2 years this issue would be solved. Especially with the growing popularity of 4k monitors. Just got mine and there are 0 fixes I've found so far. This is really frustrating because lowering the resolution from 4k down to 1080 looks like a 360p video off YouTube. I don't enjoy playing on what looks like a garbage quality YouTube video JUST so I have the privilege of being able to look at my mini-map. Really sad to see the lack of support for 4k especially on such a triple A game like league. {{item:3070}}
I run at 4K and this is a huge annoyance.
